GP12vampsm_u:295: tāṃstvaṃ prāpyasi dharmajñe matprasādānna saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_7.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:296: śṛṇu tvaṃ ca mahābhāge varo yaste hṛti sthitaḥ /

GP12vampsm_u:298: yaśceha tvadvane sthitvā trirātraṃ vai kariṣyati /

GP12vampsm_u:300: dūrastho 'pi vanaṃ yastu adityāḥ smarate naraḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:301: so 'pi yāti paraṃ sthānaṃ kiṃ punarnivasan naraḥ // VamPSm_7.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:302: yaśceha brāhmaṇān pañca trīn vā dvāvekameva vā /
GP12vampsm_u:303: bhojayecchraddhayā yuktāḥ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // VamPSm_7.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:304: aditiruvāca yadi deva prasannastvaṃ bhaktyā me bhaktavatsala /
GP12vampsm_u:307: tvayi prasanne parada tat prāpnotu suto mama // VamPSm_7.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:308: hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ na duḥkhāya mama putrasya keśava /
GP12vampsm_u:309: prapannadāyavibhraṃśo bādhāṃ me kurute hṛti // VamPSm_7.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:310: śrībhagavānuvāca kṛtaḥ prasādo hi mayā tava devi yathepsitam /
GP12vampsm_u:311: svāṃśena caiva te garbhe saṃbhaviṣyāmi kaśyapāt // VamPSm_7.10 //
GP12vampsm_u:313: tānahaṃ ca haniṣyāmi nivṛttā bhava nandini // VamPSm_7.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:317: ahaṃ tvāṃ ca vahiṣyāmi ātmānaṃ caiva nandini /
GP12vampsm_u:318: na ca pīḍāṃ kariṣyāmi svasti te 'stu vrajāmyaham // VamPSm_7.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:320: garbhasthite tataḥ khṛṣṇe cacāla saralā kṣitiḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:321: cakampire mahāśailā jagmuḥ kṣobhaṃ mahābdhayaḥ // VamPSm_7.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:330: baliruvāca tāta nistejaso daityā nirdagdhā iva vahninā /
GP12vampsm_u:332: duriṣṭaṃ kiṃ tu daityānāṃ ki kṛtyā vidhinirmitā /
GP12vampsm_u:334: lomaharṣaṇa uvāca ityasuravarastena pṛṣṭaḥ pautreṇa brāhmaṇāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:335: ciraṃ dhyātvā jagādedamasuraṃ taṃ tadā balim // VamPSm_8.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:336: prahlāda uvāca calanti girayo bhīmirjahāti sahasā dhatim /
GP12vampsm_u:337: sadyaḥ samudrāḥ kṣubhitā daityā nistejasaḥ kṛtāḥ // VamPSm_8.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:338: sūryodaye yathā pūrvaṃ tathā gacchanti na grahāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:339: devānāṃ ca parā lakṣmīḥ karaṇenānumīyate // VamPSm_8.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:341: na hyalpamiti mantavyaṃ tvayā kāryaṃ kathañcana // VamPSm_8.7 //
GP12vampsm_u:342: lomaharṣaṇa uvāca ityuktvā dānavapatiṃ prahlādaḥ so 'surottamaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:343: atyarthabhakto deveśaṃ jagāma manasā harim // VamPSm_8.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:345: vicārayāmāsa tato yathā devo janārdanaḥ // VamPSm_8.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:349: virocanaṃ ca tanayaṃ baliṃ cāsuranāyakam // VamPSm_8.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:351: ātmānamurvīṃ gaganaṃ vāyuṃ vāri hutāśanam // VamPSm_8.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:357: prahlādaḥ prāha daityendraṃ baliṃ vairociniṃ tataḥ // VamPSm_8.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:364: sthitiṃ kartu jagannāthaḥ so 'cintyo garbhatāṃ gataḥ // VamPSm_8.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:367: na yasya rudro na ca padmayonirnendro na sūryendumarīcimiśrāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:368: jānanti daityādhipa yatsvarūpaṃ sa vāsudevaḥ kalayāvatīrṇaḥ // VamPSm_8.20
GP12vampsm_u:369: yamakṣaraṃ vedavido vadanti viśanti yaṃ jñānavidhūtapāpāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:370: yasmin praviṣṭā na purarbhavanti taṃ vāsudevaṃ praṇamāmi devam //
GP12vampsm_u:372: layaṃ ca yasmin pralaye prayānti taṃ vāsudevaṃ praṇato 'smyacintyam //
GP12vampsm_u:373: na yasya rūpaṃ na balaṃ prabhāvo na ca pratāpaḥ paramasya puṃsaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:374: vijñāyate sarvapitāmahādyaistaṃ vāsudevaṃ praṇamāmi nityam // VamPSm_8.23
GP12vampsm_u:375: rūpasya cakṣurgrahaṇe tvageṣā sparśagrahitrī rasanā rasasya /
GP12vampsm_u:376: ghrāṇaṃ ca gandhagrahaṇe niyuktaṃ na ghrāṇacakṣuḥ śravaṇādi tasya //
GP12vampsm_u:377: svayaṃprakāśaḥ paramārthato yaḥ sarveśvaro veditavyaḥ sa yuktyā /
GP12vampsm_u:378: śakyaṃ tamīḍyamanaghaṃ ca devaṃ grāhyaṃ nato 'haṃ harimīśitāram //
GP12vampsm_u:380: śete grasitvā sakalaṃ jagad yastamīḍyamīśaṃ praṇato 'smi viṣṇum //
GP12vampsm_u:381: aṃśāvatīrṇena ca yena garbhe hṛtāni tejāṃsi mahāsurāṇām /
GP12vampsm_u:383: devo jagadyonirayaṃ mahātmā sa ṣoḍśāṃśena mahāsurendrāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:384: surendramāturjaṭharaṃ praviṣṭo hṛtāni vastena balaṃ vapūṃṣi // VamPSm_8.28
GP12vampsm_u:385: baliruvāca tāta ko 'yaṃ harirnāma yato no bhayamāgatam /
GP12vampsm_u:386: santi me śataśo daityā vāsudevabalādhikāḥ // VamPSm_8.29 //
GP12vampsm_u:390: ete cānye ca me santi daiteyā dānavāstathā // VamPSm_8.31 //
GP12vampsm_u:392: eṣāmekaikaśaḥ kṛṣṇo na vīryārddhena saṃmitaḥ // VamPSm_8.32 //
GP12vampsm_u:393: lomaharṣama uvāca pautrasyaitad vacaḥ śrutvā prahlādo daityasattamaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:398: tvāmṛte pāpasaṅkalpa ko 'nya evaṃ vadiṣyati // VamPSm_8.35 //
GP12vampsm_u:399: ya ete bhavatā proktāḥ samastā daityadānavāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:407: śocyo 'haṃ yasya me gehe jātastava pitādhamaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:410: kṛṣṇe bhaktirahaṃ tāvadavekṣyo bhavatā na kim // VamPSm_8.41 //
GP12vampsm_u:412: iti jānātyayaṃ loko bhavāṃśca ditinandana // VamPSm_8.42 //
GP12vampsm_u:414: nindāṃ karoṣi tasya tvamakurvan gauravaṃ mama // VamPSm_8.43 //
GP12vampsm_u:418: yasmāt tasmādihaiva tvam aiśvaryād bhrāṃśameṣyasi // VamPSm_8.45 //
GP12vampsm_u:419: sa devo jagatāṃ nātho bale prabhurjanārdanaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:420: nanvahaṃ pratyavekṣyaste bhaktimānatra me guruḥ // VamPSm_8.46 //
GP12vampsm_u:422: nāpekṣitastvayā yasmāt tasmācchāpaṃ dadāmi te // VamPSm_8.47 //
GP12vampsm_u:430: prasādayāmāsa guruṃ praṇipatya punaḥ punaḥ // VamPSm_9.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:431: baliruvāca prasīda tāta mā kopaṃ kuru mohahate mayi /
GP12vampsm_u:436: viṣaṇṇo 'si yathā tāta tathaivāvinaye kṛte // VamPSm_9.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:438: sasāre durlabhāstāta guravo ye bhavadvidhāḥ // VamPSm_9.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:439: prasīda tāta mā kopaṃ kartumarhasi daityapa /
GP12vampsm_u:441: prahlāda uvāca vatsa kopena me moho janitastena te mayā /
GP12vampsm_u:442: śāpo datto vivekaśca mohenāpahṛto mama // VamPSm_9.7 //
GP12vampsm_u:443: yadi mohena me jñānaṃ nākṣiptaṃ syānmahāsura /
GP12vampsm_u:444: tatkathaṃ sarvagaṃ jānan hariṃ kaccicchapāmyaham // VamPSm_9.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:445: yo yaḥ śāpo mayā datto bhavato 'surapuṅgava /
GP12vampsm_u:446: bhāvyametena nūnaṃ te tasmāttvaṃ mā viṣīda vai // VamPSm_9.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:448: bhavethā bhaktimānīśe sa te trātā bhaviṣyati // VamPSm_9.10 //
GP12vampsm_u:449: śāpaṃ prāpya ca me vīra deveśaḥ saṃsmṛtastvayā /
GP12vampsm_u:450: tathā tathā vadiṣyāmi śreyastvaṃ prāpsyase yathā // VamPSm_9.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:452: krameṇa hyudare devo vṛddhiṃ prāpto mahāyaśāḥ // VamPSm_9.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:453: tato māse 'tha daśame kāle prasava āgate /
GP12vampsm_u:454: ajāyata sa govindo bhagavān vāmanākṛtiḥ // VamPSm_9.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:458: dharme ca sarvabhūtānāṃ tadā matirajāyata // VamPSm_9.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:460: tadā hi sarvabhūtānāṃ dharme matirajāyata // VamPSm_9.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:462: jātakarmādikāṃ kṛtvā kriyāṃ tuṣṭāva ca prabhum // VamPSm_9.17 //
GP12vampsm_u:463: brahmovāca jayādhīśa jayājeya jaya viśvaguro hare /
GP12vampsm_u:474: jaya sūkṣmātisūkṣma tvaṃ jayānindriya sendriya // VamPSm_9.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:478: sāmprataṃ jaya viśvātman māyāvāmana keśava // VamPSm_9.25 //
GP12vampsm_u:483: na tvāmahaṃ na ceśāno nendrādyāstridaśā hare /
GP12vampsm_u:484: jñātumīśā na munayaḥ sanakādyā na yoginaḥ // VamPSm_9.28 //
GP12vampsm_u:486: kastvāṃ vetsyati sarveśa tvatprasādaṃ vinā naraḥ // VamPSm_9.29 //
GP12vampsm_u:488: sa eva kevalaṃ devaṃ vetti tvāṃ netaro naja // VamPSm_9.30 //
GP12vampsm_u:491: lomaharṣaṇa uvāca elaṃ stuto hṛṣīkeśaḥ sa tadā vāmanākṛtiḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:494: mayā ca vaḥ pratijñātamindrasya bhuvanatrayam // VamPSm_9.33 //
GP12vampsm_u:496: yathā śakrāya dāsyāmi trailokyaṃ hatakaṇṭakam // VamPSm_9.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:497: so 'haṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathendro jagataḥ patiḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:498: bhaviṣyati sahasrākṣaḥ satyametad bravīmi vaḥ // VamPSm_9.35 //
GP12vampsm_u:500: yajñopavītaṃ bhagavān dadau tasya bṛhaspatiḥ // VamPSm_9.36 //
GP12vampsm_u:503: āsanaṃ caiva pulahaḥ pulastyaḥ pītavāsasī // VamPSm_9.37 //
GP12vampsm_u:506: sa vāmano jaṭī daṇḍī chatrī dhṛtakamaṇḍaluḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:508: yatra yatra padaṃ viprā bhūbhāge vāmano dadau /
GP12vampsm_u:517: tasya saṃdarśanādeva nāgebhyo na bhayaṃ bhavet // VamPSm_9.44 //
GP12vampsm_u:523: kasmācca nāsurān bhāgān pratigṛhṇanti vahnayaḥ // VamPSm_10.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:524: iti pṛṣṭo 'tha balinā kāvyo vedavidāṃ varaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:525: uvāca daityādhipatiṃ ciraṃ dhyātvā mahāmatiḥ // VamPSm_10.3 //
GP12vampsm_u:531: neyaṃ bhūtapatiṃ bhūmiḥ samarthā voḍhumīśvaram // VamPSm_10.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:538: bhuñjate nāsurān bhāgānapi tena trayo 'gnayaḥ // VamPSm_10.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:541: yajñamabhyāgato brahman mattaḥ ko 'nyo 'dhikaḥ pumān // VamPSm_10.10 //
GP12vampsm_u:546: tvayā tu dānavā daitya yajñabhāgabhujaḥ kṛtāḥ // VamPSm_10.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:547: ayaṃ ca devaḥ sattvasthaḥ karoti sthitipālanam /
GP12vampsm_u:548: visṛṣṭaṃ ca tathāyaṃ ca svayamatti prajāḥ prabhuḥ // VamPSm_10.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:549: bhavāṃstu vandī bhavitā nūnaṃ viṣṇuḥ sthitau sthitaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:550: viditvaivaṃ mahābhāgā kuru yat te manogatam // VamPSm_10.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:552: pratijñā naiva voḍhavyā vācyaṃ sāma tathāphalam // VamPSm_10.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:554: alaṃ dadyāṃ dhanaṃ deve tvetadvācyaṃ tu yācataḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:556: baliruvāca brahman kathamahaṃ brūyāmanyenāpi hi yācitaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:559: sa me vakṣyati dehīti govindaḥkimato 'dhikam // VamPSm_10.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:561: yajñā kriyante yajñeśaḥ sa me dehīti vakṣyati // VamPSm_10.19 //
GP12vampsm_u:562: tatsādhu sukṛtaṃ karma tapaḥ sucaritaṃ canaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:563: yanmā dehīti viśveśaḥ svayameva vadiṣyati // VamPSm_10.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:565: prāṇatyāgaṃ kariṣye 'haṃ na tu nāsti jane kvacit // VamPSm_10.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:569: na bādhākāri yaddānaṃ tadaṅgaṃ balavat smṛtam // VamPSm_10.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:570: madrājye nāsukhī kaścinna daridro na cāturaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:571: na duḥkhito na cobdigno na śamādivivarjitaḥ // VamPSm_10.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:573: janaḥ sarvo mahābhāga kimutāhaṃ sadā sukhī // VamPSm_10.25 //
GP12vampsm_u:577: mama dānamavāpyāsau puṣṇāti yadi devatāḥ // VamPSm_10.27 //
GP12vampsm_u:579: janārdane mahāpātre kiṃ na prāptaṃ tato mayā // VamPSm_10.28 //
GP12vampsm_u:585: māṃ nihantuṃ tato hi syād vadhaḥ ślāghyataro 'cyutāt // VamPSm_10.31 //
GP12vampsm_u:587: naiva bhāvyaṃ jagannāthe govinde samupasthite // VamPSm_10.32 //
GP12vampsm_u:588: lomaharṣaṇa uvāca ityevaṃ vadatastasya prāptastatra janārdanaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:590: taṃ dṛṣṭvā yajñavāṭaṃ tu praviṣṭamasurāḥ prabhum /
GP12vampsm_u:591: jagmuḥ prabhāvataḥ kṣobhaṃ tejasā tasya niṣprabhāḥ // VamPSm_10.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:593: vasiṣṭho gādhijo gargo anye ca munisattamāḥ // VamPSm_10.35 //
GP12vampsm_u:595: tataḥ saṃkṣobhamāpanno na kaścit kiñciduktavān // VamPSm_10.36 //
GP12vampsm_u:597: athāsurapati prahvaṃ dṛṣṭvā munivarāśca tān // VamPSm_10.37 //
GP12vampsm_u:604: pūjayāmāsa govindaṃ prāha cedaṃ mahāsuraḥ // VamPSm_10.40 //
GP12vampsm_u:606: striyo vastrāṇyalaṅkārān gāvo grāmāśca puṣkalāḥ // VamPSm_10.41 //
GP12vampsm_u:607: sarve ca saralā pṛthvī bhavato vā yadīpsitam /
GP12vampsm_u:608: tad dadāsi vṛṇuṣveṣṭaṃ mamārthāḥ santi te priyāḥ // VamPSm_10.42 //
GP12vampsm_u:613: baliruvāca tribhiḥ prayojanaṃ kiṃ te padaiḥ padavatāṃ vara /
GP12vampsm_u:614: śataṃ śatasahasraṃ vā padānāṃ mārgatāṃ bhavān // VamPSm_10.45 //
GP12vampsm_u:615: śrīvāmana uvāca etāvatā daityapate kṛtakṛtyo 'smi mārgaṇe /
GP12vampsm_u:618: vācayāmāsa vai tasmai vāmanāya mahātmane // VamPSm_10.47 //
GP12vampsm_u:621: cantrasūryau tu nayane dyauḥ śiraścaraṇau kṣitiḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:626: tārakā romakūpāṇi romeṣu ca maharṣayaḥ // VamPSm_10.51 //
GP12vampsm_u:628: aśvinau śravaṇe tasya nāsā vāyurmahātmanaḥ // VamPSm_10.52 //
GP12vampsm_u:629: prasāde candramā devo mano dharmaḥ samāśritaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:630: satyamasyābhavad vāṇī jihvā devī sarasvatī // VamPSm_10.53 //
GP12vampsm_u:632: svargadvāramabhūnmaitraṃ tvaṣṭā pūṣā ca vai bhruvau // VamPSm_10.54 //
GP12vampsm_u:634: hṛdayaṃ ca paraṃ brahma puṃstvaṃ vai kaśyapo muniḥ // VamPSm_10.55 //
GP12vampsm_u:636: vakṣasthale tathā rudro dhairye cāsya mahārṇavaḥ // VamPSm_10.56 //
GP12vampsm_u:638: lakṣmīrmedhā dhṛtiḥ kāntiḥ sarvavidyāśca vai kaṭiḥ // VamPSm_10.57 //
GP12vampsm_u:641: tanau kukṣiṣu vedāśca jānunī ca mahāmakhāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:642: iṣṭayaḥ paśavaścāsya dvijānāṃ ceṣṭitāni ca // VamPSm_10.59 //
GP12vampsm_u:644: upasarpanti te daityāḥ pataṅgā iva pāvakam // VamPSm_10.60 //
GP12vampsm_u:648: kṛtvā rūpaṃ mahākāyaṃ saṃjahārāśu medinīm // VamPSm_10.62 //
GP12vampsm_u:658: yat tvayā salilaṃ dattaṃ gṛhītaṃ pāṇinā mayā // VamPSm_10.67 //
GP12vampsm_u:660: vaivakhate tathātīte kāle manvantare tathā // VamPSm_10.68 //
GP12vampsm_u:662: idānīṃ bhuvanaṃ sarvaṃ dattaṃ śakrāya vai purā // VamPSm_10.69 //
GP12vampsm_u:664: niyantavyā mayā sarve ye tasya paripanthinaḥ // VamPSm_10.70 //
GP12vampsm_u:666: sutalaṃ nāma pātālaṃ samāsādya vaco mama // VamPSm_10.71 //
GP12vampsm_u:674: yāvatsuraiśca vipraiśca na virodhaṃ gamiṣyasi // VamPSm_10.75 //
GP12vampsm_u:676: yadā suraiśca vipraiśca virodhaṃ tvaṃ kariṣyasi /
GP12vampsm_u:677: bandhiṣyanti tadā pāsā vāruṇā ghoradarśanāḥ // VamPSm_10.76 //
GP12vampsm_u:678: baliruvāca tatrāsato me pātāle bhagavan bhavadājñayā /
GP12vampsm_u:680: āpyāyito yena deva smareyaṃ tvāmahaṃ sadā // VamPSm_10.77 //
GP12vampsm_u:682: hutānyaśraddhayā yāni tāni dāsyanti te phalam // VamPSm_10.78 //
GP12vampsm_u:684: phalāni tava dāsyanti adhītānyavratāni ca // VamPSm_10.79 //
GP12vampsm_u:685: udakena vinā pūjā vinā darbeṇa yā kriyā /
GP12vampsm_u:686: ājyena ca vinā homaṃ phalaṃ dāsyanti te bale // VamPSm_10.80 //
GP12vampsm_u:688: na tatra cāsuro bhāgo bhaviṣyati kadācana // VamPSm_10.81 //
GP12vampsm_u:690: ye ca śrāddhāni dāsyanti vrataṃ niyamameva ca // VamPSm_10.82 //
GP12vampsm_u:691: kriyā kṛtā ca yā kācid vidhināvidhināpi vā /
GP12vampsm_u:692: sarvaṃ tadakṣayaṃ tasya bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_10.83 //
GP12vampsm_u:694: dvādaśyāṃ vāmanaṃ dṛṣṭvā snātvā viṣṇupade hvade /
GP12vampsm_u:695: dānaṃ dattvā yathāśaktyā prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_10.84 //
GP12vampsm_u:696: lomaharṣaṇa uvāca balervaramimaṃ dattvā śakrāya ca triviṣṭapam /
GP12vampsm_u:697: vyāpinā tena rūpeṇa jagāmādarśanaṃ hariḥ // VamPSm_10.85 //
GP12vampsm_u:699: niḥśeṣaṃ ca tadā kālaṃ baliḥ pātālamāsthitaḥ // VamPSm_10.86 //
GP12vampsm_u:701: vāmanasya śṛṇvan yastu sarvapāṣaiḥ pramucyate // VamPSm_10.87 //
GP12vampsm_u:703: balerviṣṇośca caritaṃ ye smariṣyanti mānavāḥ // VamPSm_10.88 //
GP12vampsm_u:704: nādhayo vyādhayasteṣāṃ na ca mohākulaṃ manaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:707: samāpneti mahābhāgā naraḥ śrutvā kathāmimām // VamPSm_10.90 //
GP12vampsm_u:710: vāmanasya ca māhatmyaṃ śṛṇvan pāpaiḥ pramucyate // VamPSm_10.91 //
GP12vampsm_u:712: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ kathameṣā samutpannā nadīnāmuttamā nadī /
GP12vampsm_u:714: kathaṃ saraḥ samāsādya kṛtvā tīrthāni pārśvataḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:716: etad vistarato brūhi tīrthaṃvaṃśaṃ sanātanam // VamPSm_11.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:717: lomaharṣaṇa uvāca plakṣavṛkṣāt samudbhūtā saricchreṣṭhā sanātanī /
GP12vampsm_u:720: praviṣṭā puṇyatoyaughā vanaṃ dvaitamiti smṛtam // VamPSm_11.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:721: tasmin palkṣe sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmuniḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:722: praṇipatya tadā mūrdhnā tuṣṭāvātha sarasvatīm // VamPSm_11.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:723: tvaṃ devi sarvalokānāṃ mātā devāraṇiḥ śubhā /
GP12vampsm_u:725: tat sarvaṃ tvayi saṃyogi yogivad devi saṃsthitam /
GP12vampsm_u:726: akṣaraṃ paramaṃ devī yatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GP12vampsm_u:727: akṣaraṃ paramaṃ brahma viśvaṃ caitat kṣarātmakam // VamPSm_11.7 //
GP12vampsm_u:729: tathā tvayi sthitaṃ brahma jagaccedamaśeṣataḥ // VamPSm_11.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:731: tatra mātrātrayaṃ sarvamasti yad devi nāsti ca // VamPSm_11.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:733: trīṇi jyotīṃṣi vargāśca trayo dharmādayastathā // VamPSm_11.10 //
GP12vampsm_u:742: tavaitat paramaṃ rūpaṃ yanna śakyaṃ mayoditum /
GP12vampsm_u:743: na cāsyena na vā jihvātālvoṣṭhādibhirucyate // VamPSm_11.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:744: sa viṣṇuḥ sa vṛṣo brahma candrākrajyotireva ca /
GP12vampsm_u:749: anākhyaṃ ṣaḍguṇākhyaṃ ca bahvākhyaṃ triguṇāśrayam // VamPSm_11.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:751: sukhāt sukhaṃ mahātsaukhyaṃ rūpaṃ tattvaguṇātmakam // VamPSm_11.19 //
GP12vampsm_u:752: evaṃ devi tvayā vyāptaṃ sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ ca yat /
GP12vampsm_u:753: advaitāvasthitaṃ brahma yacca dvaite vyavasthitam // VamPSm_11.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:754: ye'rthā nityā ye vinaśyanti cānye ye'rthāḥ sthūlā ye tathā santi sūkṣmāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:755: ye vā bhūmau ye 'ntarikṣenyato vā teṣāṃ devi tvatta evopalabdhiḥ //
GP12vampsm_u:756: yadvā mūrtaṃ yadamūrtaṃ samastaṃ yadvā bhūteṣvekamekaṃ ca kiñcit /
GP12vampsm_u:757: yacca dvaite vyastabhūtaṃ ca lakṣyaṃ tatsaṃbaddhaṃ tvatsvarairvyañjanaiśca
GP12vampsm_u:758: evaṃ stutā tadā devī viṣṇorjihvā sarasvatī /
GP12vampsm_u:760: yatra tvaṃ neṣyase vipra tatra yāsyāmyatandritā // VamPSm_11.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:761: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca ādyaṃ brahmasaraḥ puṇyaṃ tato rāmahvadaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:762: kuruṇā ṛṣiṇā puṣṭaṃ kurukṣetraṃ tataḥ smṛtam /
GP12vampsm_u:763: tasya madhyena vai gāḍhaṃ puṇyā puṇyajalāvahā // VamPSm_11.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:767: nadī pravāhasaṃyuktā kurukṣetraṃ viveśa ha // VamPSm_12.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:768: tatra sā rantukaṃ prāpya puṇyatoyā sarasvatī /
GP12vampsm_u:769: kurakṣetraṃ samāplāvya prayātā paścimāṃ diśam // VamPSm_12.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:770: tatra tīrthasahasrāṇi ṛṣibhiḥ sevitāni ca/ tānyahaṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi prasādāt
GP12vampsm_u:774: ye smaranti ca tīrthāni devatāḥ prīṇayanti ca /
GP12vampsm_u:775: snānti ca śraddadhānāśca te yānti paramāṃ gatim // VamPSm_12.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:776: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gato 'pi vā /
GP12vampsm_u:777: yaḥ smaret kurukṣetraṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraḥ śuciḥ // VamPSm_12.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:781: vāsaḥ puṃsāṃ kurukṣetre muktiruktā caturvidhā // VamPSm_12.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:783: taṃ devanirmitaṃ deśaṃ brahmavartaṃ pracakṣate // VamPSm_12.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:785: evaṃ yaḥ satataṃ brūyāt so 'pi pāṣaiḥ pramucyate // VamPSm_12.10 //
GP12vampsm_u:787: tasya jñānaṃ brahmamayamutpatsyati na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_12.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:789: tasya saṃsevanānnityaṃ brahma cātmani paśyati // VamPSm_12.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:790: cañcalaṃ hi manuṣyatvaṃ prāpya ye mokṣakāṅkiṇaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:793: paśyanti nirmalaṃ devaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ sanātanam // VamPSm_12.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:794: brahmavediḥ kurukṣetraṃ puṇyaṃ sānnihitaṃ saraḥ // VamPSm_12.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:796: kurukṣetre mṛtānāṃ ca patanaṃ naiva vidyate // VamPSm_12.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:799: gatvā tu śraddhāyā yuktaḥ snātvā sthāṇumahāhvade /
GP12vampsm_u:800: manasā cintitaṃ kāmaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_12.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:801: niyamaṃ ta tataḥ kṛtvā gatvā saraḥ pradakṣiṇam /
GP12vampsm_u:802: rantukaṃ ca samāsādya kṣamayitvā punaḥ punaḥ // VamPSm_12.19 //
GP12vampsm_u:803: sarasvatyāṃ naraḥ snātvā yakṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇamya ca /
GP12vampsm_u:804: puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ ca naivaidyaṃ datvā vācamudīrayet // VamPSm_12.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:805: tava prasādād yakṣendra vānāni saritaśca yāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:806: bhramiṣyāmi ca tīrthāni avighneṃ kuru me sadā // VamPSm_12.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:808: ṛśaya ūcuḥ vanāni sapta no brūhi nava nadyaśca yāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:809: tīrthāni ca samagrāṇi tīrthasnānaphalaṃ tathā // VamPSm_13.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:810: yena yena vidhānena yasya tīrthasya yat phalam /
GP12vampsm_u:811: tat sarvaṃ vistateṇeha brūhi paurāṇikottama // VamPSm_13.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:814: yeṣāṃ nāmāni puṇyāni sarvapāpaharāṇi ca // VamPSm_13.3 //
GP12vampsm_u:815: kāmyakaṃ ca vanaṃ puṇyaṃ tathāditivanaṃ mahat /
GP12vampsm_u:816: vyāsasya ca vanaṃ puṇyaṃ phalakīvanameva ca // VamPSm_13.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:819: vanānyetāni vai sapta nadīḥ śṛṇuta me dvijāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:820: sarasvatī nadī puṇyā tathā vaitaraṇī nadī // VamPSm_13.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:821: āpagā ca mahāpuṇyā gaṅgā mandākinī nadī /
GP12vampsm_u:827: tīrthasya ca prabhāveṇa puṇyā hyetāḥ saridvarāḥ // VamPSm_13.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:830: rantukaṃ ca naro dṛṣṭvā dvārapālaṃ mahābalam /
GP12vampsm_u:833: adityā yatra gutrārthaṃ kṛtaṃ ghoraṃ mahattapaḥ // VamPSm_13.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:834: tatra snātvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca aditiṃ devamātaram /
GP12vampsm_u:838: savanaṃ nāma vikhyātaṃ yatra saṃnihito hariḥ // VamPSm_13.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:839: vimale ca naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā ca vimaleśvaram /
GP12vampsm_u:840: nirmalaṃ svargamāyāti rudralokaṃ ca gacchati // VamPSm_13.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:844: tatra snātvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca brahmāṇaṃ vedasaṃyutam // VamPSm_13.17 //
GP12vampsm_u:847: saṃgame ca naraḥ snātvā prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_13.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:849: kṣāntiyukto naraḥ snātvā prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_13.19 //
GP12vampsm_u:851: sarvāṇi kṣamate tasya snātamātrasya dehinaḥ // VamPSm_13.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:852: tato dakṣāśramaṃ gatvā dṛṣṭvā dekṣeśvaraṃ śivam /
GP12vampsm_u:853: aśvamedhasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ // VamPSm_13.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:854: tataḥ śālūkinīṃ gatvā snātvā tīrthe dvijottamāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:858: tatra snānaṃ naraḥ kṛtvā mukto nāgabhayād bhavet // VamPSm_13.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:859: tato gaccheta viprendrā dvārapālaṃ tu rantukam /
GP12vampsm_u:860: tatroṣya rajanīmekāṃ snātvā tīrthavare śubhe // VamPSm_13.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:862: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā ca praṇipatya kṣamāpayet // VamPSm_13.25 //
GP12vampsm_u:863: tava prasādād yakṣendra mukto bhavati kilbiṣaiḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:865: evaṃ prasādya yakṣendraṃ tataḥ pañcanadaṃ vrajet // VamPSm_13.26 //
GP12vampsm_u:867: tatra sarveṣu lokeṣu tīrthaṃ pañcanadaṃ smṛtam // VamPSm_13.27 //
GP12vampsm_u:870: tasmin tīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā koṭīśvaraṃ haram /
GP12vampsm_u:873: tatrāpi ca naraḥ snātvā hyagniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_13.30 //
GP12vampsm_u:875: rūpasya bhāgī bhavati yaśasvī ca bhavennaraḥ // VamPSm_13.31 //
GP12vampsm_u:877: tasmin snātvā śraddadhānaḥ prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_13.32 //
GP12vampsm_u:880: tatra someśvare dṛṣṭvā snātvā tīrthavare śubhe /
GP12vampsm_u:881: rājasūyasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ // VamPSm_13.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:885: tāvubhau liṅgāvabhyarcya na bhūyo janma cāpnuyāt // VamPSm_13.36 //
GP12vampsm_u:889: tato muñjavaṭaṃ nāma mahādevasya dhīmataḥ // VamPSm_13.38 //
GP12vampsm_u:891: tatraiva ca mahāgrāhī yakṣiṇī lokaviśrutā // VamPSm_13.39 //
GP12vampsm_u:896: puṣkaraṃ ca tato gatvā abhyarcya pitṛdevatāḥ // VamPSm_13.41 //
GP12vampsm_u:898: kṛtakṛtyo bhaved rājā aśvamedhaṃ ca vindati // VamPSm_13.42 //
GP12vampsm_u:899: kanyādānaṃ ca yastatra kārtikyāṃ vai kariṣyati /
GP12vampsm_u:902: vighnaṃ karoti pāpānāṃ durgati ca prayacchati // VamPSm_13.44 //
GP12vampsm_u:904: āhatya dundubhiṃ tatra bhramate nityameva hi // VamPSm_13.45 //
GP12vampsm_u:905: sā dadarśa striyaṃ caikāṃ saputrāṃ pāpadeśajām /
GP12vampsm_u:906: tāmuvāca tadā yakṣī āhatya niśi dundubhim // VamPSm_13.46 //
GP12vampsm_u:908: tadvad bhūtālaye snātvā saputrā vastumicchasi // VamPSm_13.47 //
GP12vampsm_u:909: divā mayā te kathitaṃ rātrau bhakṣyāmi niścitam /
GP12vampsm_u:910: etacchrutvā tu vacanaṃ praṇipatya ca yakṣiṇīm // VamPSm_13.48 //
GP12vampsm_u:911: uvāca dīnayā vācā prasādaṃ kuru bhāmini /
GP12vampsm_u:912: tataḥ sā yakṣiṇī tāṃ tu provāca kṛpayānvitā // VamPSm_13.49 //
GP12vampsm_u:913: yadā sūryasya grahaṇaṃ kālena bhavitā kvacit /
GP12vampsm_u:914: saṃnihatyāṃ tadā snātvā pūtā svargaṃ kamiṣyasi // VamPSm_13.50 //
GP12vampsm_u:918: yatra rāmeṇa vipreṇa tarasā dīptatejasā // VamPSm_14.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:920: pūrayitvā naravyāghra rudhireṇeti naḥ śrutam // VamPSm_14.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:923: rāma rāma mahābāho prītāḥ smastava bhārgava /
GP12vampsm_u:924: anayā pitṛbhaktyā ca vikrameṇa ca te vibho // VamPSm_14.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:925: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te kimicchasi mahāyaśaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:926: evamuktastu pitṛbhī rāmaḥ prabhavatāḥ paraḥ // VamPSm_14.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:927: abravīt prāñjalirvākyaṃ sa pitṛn gagane sthitān /
GP12vampsm_u:928: bhavanto yadi me prītā yadya nugrāhyatā mayi // VamPSm_14.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:938: hradāśca tava tīrthatvaṃ gamīṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_14.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:939: hradeṣveteṣu ye snātvā svān pitṝṃstarpayanti ca /
GP12vampsm_u:940: tebhyo dāsyanti pitaro yathābhilaṣitaṃ varam // VamPSm_14.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:941: īpsitān mānasān kāmān svargavāsaṃ ca śāśvatam /
GP12vampsm_u:942: evaṃ dattvā varān viprā rāmasya pitarastadā // VamPSm_14.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:944: evaṃ rāmahradāḥ puṇyā bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ // VamPSm_14.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:946: rāmamabhyarcya śraddhāvān vinded bahu suvarṇakam // VamPSm_14.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:948: svavaṃśasiddhaye viprāḥ snātvā vai vaṃśamūlake // VamPSm_14.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:957: lokā yatroddhatāḥ sarve viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // VamPSm_14.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:959: snātvātīrthavare tasmin lokān paśyati śāśvatān // VamPSm_14.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:960: yatra viṣṇuḥ sthito nityaṃ śivo devaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:961: tau devau praṇipātena prasādya muktimāpnuyāt // VamPSm_14.22 //
GP12vampsm_u:963: tatra snātasya sānnidhyaṃ sadā devī prayacchati // VamPSm_14.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:965: tatra snātvār'cayitvā ca daivatāni pitṛstathā // VamPSm_14.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:967: tatra sthitaṃ mahādevaṃ kāpilaṃ vapurāsthitam // VamPSm_14.25 //
GP12vampsm_u:977: udgārāt surabhirjātā sā ca pātālamāśritā // VamPSm_14.30 //
GP12vampsm_u:981: āhutā brahmaṇā tāśca vibhrāntā vivareṇa hi // VamPSm_14.32 //
GP12vampsm_u:982: tasmin vivaradvāre tu sthito gaṇapatiḥ svayam /
GP12vampsm_u:983: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā sakalān kāmān prāpnotisaṃyatendriyaḥ // VamPSm_14.33 //
GP12vampsm_u:985: devyāstīrthe naraḥ snātvā labhate rūpamuttamam // VamPSm_14.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:987: bhogāṃśca vipulān bhuktvā prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_14.35 //
GP12vampsm_u:989: bhavate nātra sandehaḥ prāṇān muñcati svecchayā // VamPSm_14.36 //
GP12vampsm_u:990: tato gaccheta viprendrā dvārapālaṃ tu rantukam /
GP12vampsm_u:991: tasya tīrthaṃ sarasvatyāṃ yakṣendrasya mahātmanaḥ // VamPSm_14.37 //
GP12vampsm_u:993: yakṣasya ca prasādena labhate kāmikaṃ phalam // VamPSm_14.38 //
GP12vampsm_u:995: brahmāvarte naraḥ snātvā brahma cāpnoti niścitam // VamPSm_14.39 //
GP12vampsm_u:997: tatra saṃnihitā nityaṃ pitaro daivataiḥ saha // VamPSm_14.40 //
GP12vampsm_u:1001: kāmeśvarasya tīrthaṃ tu snātvā śraddhāsamanvitaḥ // VamPSm_14.42 //
GP12vampsm_u:1003: mātṛtīrthaṃ ca tatraiva yatra snātasya bhaktitaḥ // VamPSm_14.43 //
GP12vampsm_u:1007: punāti darśanādeva daṇḍakaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ // VamPSm_14.45 //
GP12vampsm_u:1008: keśānabhyukṣya vai tasmin pūto bhavati pāpataḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1009: tatra tīrthavaraṃ cānyat svānulomāyanaṃ mahat // VamPSm_14.46 //
GP12vampsm_u:1013: pūtātmānaśca te viprāḥ prayānti paramāṃ gatim // VamPSm_14.48 //
GP12vampsm_u:1015: tatra snātvā bhaktiyuktastadeva labhate phalam // VamPSm_14.49 //
GP12vampsm_u:1017: darśanāt tasya tīrthasya mukto bhavati kilbiṣaiḥ // VamPSm_14.50 //
GP12vampsm_u:1020: tato vyādhāśca te sarve tānapṛcchan dvijottamān /
GP12vampsm_u:1021: mṛgā anena vai yātā asmābhiḥ śarapīḍitāḥ // VamPSm_14.52 //
GP12vampsm_u:1022: nimagnāste saraḥ prāpya kva te yātā dvijottamāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1023: te 'bruvaṃstatra vai pṛṣṭā vayaṃ te ca dvijottamāḥ // VamPSm_14.53 //
GP12vampsm_u:1025: tasmād yūyaṃ śraddadhānāḥ snātvā tīrthe vimatsarāḥ // VamPSm_14.54 //
GP12vampsm_u:1027: tataḥ snātāśca te sarve śuddhadehā divaṃ gatāḥ // VamPSm_14.55 //
GP12vampsm_u:1029: ye śṛṇvanti śraddadhānāste 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim // VamPSm_14.56 //
GP12vampsm_u:1033: āpagā nāma vikhyātā nadī dvijaniṣevitā // VamPSm_15.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:1035: ye prayacchanti viprebhyasteṣāṃ pāpaṃ na vidyate // VamPSm_15.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:1036: ye tu śrāddhaṃ kariṣyanti prāpya tāmāpagāṃ nadīm /
GP12vampsm_u:1037: te sarvakāmasaṃyuktā bhaviṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_15.3 //
GP12vampsm_u:1038: śaṃsanti sarve pitaraḥ smaranti ca pitāmahāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1039: asmākaṃ ca kule putraḥ pautro vāpi bhaviṣyati // VamPSm_15.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:1040: ya āpagāṃ nadīṃ gatvā tilaiḥ saṃtarpayiṣyati /
GP12vampsm_u:1041: tena tṛptā bhaviṣyāmo yāvatkalpaśataṃ gatam // VamPSm_15.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:1043: caturdaśyāṃ tu madhyāhne piṇḍado muktimāpnuyāt // VamPSm_15.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:1050: etaiḥ sametya tatkuṇḍaṃ kalpitaṃ bhuvi durlabham /
GP12vampsm_u:1054: devān pitṝn samuddiśya yo vipraṃ bhojayiṣyati /
GP12vampsm_u:1055: pitarastasya sukhitā dāsyanti bhuvi durlabham // VamPSm_15.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:1057: ṛṣīṇāṃ ca prasādena saptalokādhipo bhavet // VamPSm_15.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:1059: yasmin sthitaḥ khayaṃ devo vṛddhakedārasaṃjñitaḥ // VamPSm_15.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:1063: diṇḍidevaṃ namaskṛtya kedārasya phalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_15.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:1066: kalasyāṃ tu tato gacched yatra devī svayaṃ sthitā /
GP12vampsm_u:1067: durgā kātyāyanī bhadrā nidrā māyā sanātanī // VamPSm_15.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:1068: kalasyāṃ ca naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā durgā taṭe sthitām /
GP12vampsm_u:1071: kṛṣṇapakṣe caturdaśyāṃ dṛṣṭvā devaṃ maheśvaram // VamPSm_15.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:1073: tisrāḥ koṭyastu tīrthānāṃ sarake dvijasattamāḥ // VamPSm_15.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:1075: tasmin sare ca yaḥ snātvā rudrakoṭiṃ smarennaraḥ // VamPSm_15.22 //
GP12vampsm_u:1079: iḍāspadaṃ ca tatraiva tīrthaṃ pāpabhayāpaham // VamPSm_15.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:1084: tatra snātvā tu puruṣaḥ sarvadānaphalaṃ labhet /
GP12vampsm_u:1085: kiṃrūpaṃ ca mahātīrthaṃ tatraiva bhuvi durlabham // VamPSm_15.27 //
GP12vampsm_u:1089: tiryagyonau sthito viṣṇuḥ siṃheṣu ratimāpnuvan // VamPSm_15.29 //
GP12vampsm_u:1090: tato devāḥ sagandharvā ārāghya varadaṃ śivam /
GP12vampsm_u:1094: yudhyamānau tu tau devau patitau saramadhyataḥ // VamPSm_15.31 //
GP12vampsm_u:1098: tau dṛṣṭvā tatra puruṣau tuṣṭāva bhaktibhāvitaḥ // VamPSm_15.33 //
GP12vampsm_u:1100: haraye ca umābhartre sthitikālabhṛte namaḥ // VamPSm_15.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:1103: dhanyo 'haṃ sukṛtī nityaṃ yad dṛṣṭo puruṣottamau /
GP12vampsm_u:1106: ya ihāgatya snātvā ca pitṝn saṃtarpayiṣyati /
GP12vampsm_u:1108: aśvatthasya tu yanmūlaṃ sadā tatra vasāmyaham /
GP12vampsm_u:1109: aśvatthavandanaṃ kṛtvā yamaṃ raudraṃ na paśyati // VamPSm_15.38 //
GP12vampsm_u:1111: pauṇḍarīke naraḥ snātvā puṇḍarīkaphalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_15.39 //
GP12vampsm_u:1113: snānaṃ japaṃ tathā śrāddhaṃ muktimārgapradāyakam // VamPSm_15.40 //
GP12vampsm_u:1115: tatra vaitaraṇī puṇyā nadī pāpapramocanī // VamPSm_15.41 //
GP12vampsm_u:1121: pūjayitvā śivaṃ tatra pāpalepo na vidyate // VamPSm_15.44 //
GP12vampsm_u:1123: yatra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ sādhyāśca ṛṣayaḥ sthitāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1125: dṛṣadvatyāṃ naraḥ snātvā tarpayitvā ca devatāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1127: somakṣaye ca saṃprāpte somasya ca dine tathā /
GP12vampsm_u:1128: yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kurute martyastasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu // VamPSm_15.47 //
GP12vampsm_u:1129: gayāyāṃ ca yatā śrāddha pitṛn prīṇāti nityaśaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1130: tathā śrāddhaṃ ca kartavyaṃ phalakīvanamāśritaiḥ // VamPSm_15.48 //
GP12vampsm_u:1132: tasyāpi pitarastṛptiṃ prayāsyanti na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_15.49 //
GP12vampsm_u:1134: tasmin snātastu puruṣo gosahasraphalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_15.50 //
GP12vampsm_u:1135: pāṇikhāte naraḥ snātvā pitṛn saṃtarpya mānavaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1136: avāpnuyād rājasūyaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca vindati // VamPSm_15.51 //
GP12vampsm_u:1138: tatra tīrthāni muninā miśritāni mahātmanā // VamPSm_15.52 //
GP12vampsm_u:1140: sarvatīrtheṣu sa snāti miśrake snāti yo naraḥ // VamPSm_15.53 //
GP12vampsm_u:1142: manojave naraḥ snātvā miśrake snāti yo naraḥ // VamPSm_15.54 //

GP12vampsm_u:2262: yajñavāhāya havyāya tapyāya tapanāya ca // VamPSm_26.95 //
GP12vampsm_u:2263: namastu payase tubhyaṃ tuṇḍānāṃ pataye namaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2268: namo bālāya vṛddhāya kṣubdhāya kṣobhaṇāya ca // VamPSm_26.98 //
GP12vampsm_u:2286: sraṣṭā carācarasyāsya pātā hantā tathaiva ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2287: tvāmāhurbrahya vidvāṃso brahma brahmavidāṃ gatim // VamPSm_26.107 //
GP12vampsm_u:2292: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā varṇāvarāśca ye /
GP12vampsm_u:2295: yugā nimeṣāḥ kāṣṭhāśca nakṣatrāṇi grahāḥ kalāḥ // VamPSm_26.111 //
GP12vampsm_u:2296: vṛkṣāṇāṃ kakubho 'si tvaṃ girīṇāṃ himavān giriḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2297: vyāghro mṛgāṇāṃ patatāṃ tārkṣyo 'nantaśca bhoginām // VamPSm_26.112 //
GP12vampsm_u:2299: vajraṃ praharaṇānāṃ ca vratānāṃ satyameva ca // VamPSm_26.113 //
GP12vampsm_u:2300: tvameva dveṣa icchā ca rāgo mohaḥ kṣamākṣame /
GP12vampsm_u:2302: tvaṃ śarī tvaṃ gadī cāpi khaṭvāṅgī ca śarāsanī /
GP12vampsm_u:2303: chettā mettā prahartāsi mantā netā sanātanaḥ // VamPSm_26.115 //
GP12vampsm_u:2305: samudrāḥ sarito gaṅgā parvatāśca sarāṃsi ca // VamPSm_26.116 //
GP12vampsm_u:2309: lohito harito nīlaḥ kuṣṇaḥ pītaḥ sitastathā // VamPSm_26.118 //
GP12vampsm_u:2311: savarṇaścāpyavarṇāśca kartā hartā tvameva hi // VamPSm_26.119 //
GP12vampsm_u:2315: pavitraṃ ca pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam // VamPSm_26.121 //
GP12vampsm_u:2317: prāṇāḥ sattvaṃ rajaścaiva tamaśca pratipatpitiḥ // VamPSm_26.122 //
GP12vampsm_u:2318: prāṇo 'pānaḥ masānaśca udāno vyāna eva ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2319: unmeṣaśca nimeṣaśca kṣutaṃ jṛmbhitameva ca // VamPSm_26.123 //
GP12vampsm_u:2323: matsyo jālo jalaukāśca kālaḥ kelikalā kaliḥ // VamPSm_26.125 //
GP12vampsm_u:2324: akālaśca vikālaśca duṣkālaḥ kāla eva ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2325: mṛtyuśca mṛtyukartā ca yakṣo yakṣabhayaṅkaraḥ // VamPSm_26.126 //
GP12vampsm_u:2327: ghaṇṭo ghaṇṭī māhaghaṇṭī cirī mālī ca mātaliḥ // VamPSm_26.127 //
GP12vampsm_u:2333: śilpaṃ ca śilpināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvaśilpapravartakaḥ // VamPSm_26.130 //
GP12vampsm_u:2335: svāhā svadhā vaṣaṭkāro namaskāro namo namaḥ // VamPSm_26.131 //
GP12vampsm_u:2337: dhātā vidhātā saṃdhātā pṛthivyā dharaṇo 'paraḥ // VamPSm_26.132 //
GP12vampsm_u:2338: brahma tapaśca satyaṃ ca vratacarya mathārjavam /
GP12vampsm_u:2340: bhūrbhuvaḥ svarṛtaṃ caiva dhruvo dānto maheśvaraḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2343: binduḥ kāmo hyaṇuḥ sthūlaḥ karṇikārasrajapriyaḥ // VamPSm_26.135 //
GP12vampsm_u:2348: trailokyagoptā govindo gomārgo mārga eva ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2349: sthiraḥ śreṣṭhaśca sthāṇuśca vikrośaḥ krośa eva ca // VamPSm_26.138 //
GP12vampsm_u:2351: durddharṣo duṣprakāśaśca durdurśo durjayo jayaḥ // VamPSm_26.139 //
GP12vampsm_u:2361: hiraṇyaretāḥ puruṣastvamekaḥ tvaṃ strī pumāṃstvaṃ hi napuṃsakaṃ ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2362: bālo yuvā sthaviro devadaṃṣṭrā tvanno girirviśvakṛd viśvahartā //
GP12vampsm_u:2363: tvaṃ vai dhātā viśvakṛtāṃ vareṇyas tvāṃ pūjayanti praṇatāḥ sadaiva /
GP12vampsm_u:2364: candrādityau cakṣuṣī te bhavān hi tvameva cāgniḥ prapitāmahaśca /
GP12vampsm_u:2365: ārādhya tvāṃ sarakhatīṃ vāglabhante ahorātre nimiṣonmeṣakartā //
GP12vampsm_u:2366: na brahmā na ca govindaḥ paurāṇā ṛṣayo na te /
GP12vampsm_u:2367: māhātmyaṃ vedituṃ śaktā yātātathyena śaṅkara // VamPSm_26.146 //
GP12vampsm_u:2369: mahatastamasaḥ pāre goptā mantā bhavān sadā // VamPSm_26.147 //
GP12vampsm_u:2371: jyotiḥ paśyanti yuñjānāstasmai yogātmane namaḥ // VamPSm_26.148 //
GP12vampsm_u:2372: yā mūrtayaśca sūkṣmāste na śakyā yā nidarśitum /
GP12vampsm_u:2373: tābhirmāṃ satataṃ rakṣa pitā putramivaurasam // VamPSm_26.149 //
GP12vampsm_u:2374: rakṣa māṃ rakṣaṇīyo 'haṃ tavānagha namo 'stu te /
GP12vampsm_u:2375: bhaktānukampī bhagavān bhaktaścāhaṃ sadā tvayi // VamPSm_26.150 //
GP12vampsm_u:2382: praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoryaḥ somaṃ pibate niśi /
GP12vampsm_u:2383: grasatyarkaṃ ca kharbhānū rakṣitastava tejasā // VamPSm_26.154 //
GP12vampsm_u:2384: ye cātra patitā garbhā rudragandhasya rakṣeṇa /
GP12vampsm_u:2385: namaste 'stu khadhā khāhā prāpnuvanti tadadbhute // VamPSm_26.155 //
GP12vampsm_u:2387: rakṣantu te hi māṃ nityaṃ te māmāpyāyayantu vai // VamPSm_26.156 //
GP12vampsm_u:2388: ye nadīṣu samudreṣu parvateṣu guhāsu ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2392: ye ca pañcasu bhūteṣu diśāsu vidiśāsu ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2394: rasātalagatā ye ca ye ca tasmāt paraṃ gatāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2396: yeṣāṃ na vidyate saṃkhyā pramāṇaṃ rūpameva ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2398: prasīda mama bhadraṃ te tava bhāvagatasya ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2399: tvayi me hṛdayaṃ deva tvayi buddhirmatistvayi // VamPSm_26.162 //
GP12vampsm_u:2400: stutvaivaṃ sa mahādevaṃ virarāma dvijottmaḥ // VamPSm_26.163 //
GP12vampsm_u:2405: aho tuṣṭo 'smi te rājan stavenānena suvrata /
GP12vampsm_u:2407: uṣitvā suciraṃ kālaṃ mama gātrodbhavaḥ punaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2408: asuro hyandhako nāma bhaviṣyasi surāntakṛt // VamPSm_27.3 //
GP12vampsm_u:2412: dehaṃ śulena hatvāhaṃ pāvayiṣyāmi samārbudam // VamPSm_27.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:2413: tatrāpyakalmaṣo bhūtvā stutvā māṃ bhaktitaḥ punaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2414: khyātogaṇādhipo bhūtvā nāmnā bhṛṅgiriṭiḥ smṛtaḥ // VamPSm_27.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:2415: matsannidhāne sthitvā tvaṃ tataḥ siddhiṃ gamiṣyasi /
GP12vampsm_u:2416: venaproktaṃ stavamimaṃ kīrtayed yaḥ śṛṇoti ca // VamPSm_27.7 //
GP12vampsm_u:2418: yathā sarveṣu deveṣu viśiṣṭo bhagavāñśivaḥ // VamPSm_27.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:2424: anenaiva tu dehena gaṇānāṃ śreṣṭhatāṃ vrajet // VamPSm_27.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:2425: tejasā yaśasā caiva yukto bhavati nirmalaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2426: na rākṣasāḥ piśācā vā na bhūtā na vināyakāḥ // VamPSm_27.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:2427: vighnaṃ kuryurgṛhe tatra yatrāyaṃ paṭhyate stavaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2428: śruṇuyād yā stavaṃ nārī anujñāṃ prāpya bhartṛtaḥ // VamPSm_27.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:2429: mātṛpakṣe pituḥ pakṣe pūjyā bhavati devavat /
GP12vampsm_u:2430: śruṇuyād yaḥ stavaṃ divyaṃ kīrtayed vā samāhitaḥ // VamPSm_27.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:2431: tasya sarvāṇi kāryāṇa siddhiṃ gacchanti nityaśaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2432: manasā cintitaṃ yacca yacca vācānukīrtitam // VamPSm_27.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:2435: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yattvayā manasepsitam // VamPSm_27.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:2436: vena uvāca asya liṅgasya māhātmyāt tathā liṅgasya darśanāt /
GP12vampsm_u:2437: mukto 'haṃ pātakaiḥ sarvaistava darśanataḥ kila // VamPSm_27.17 //
GP12vampsm_u:2438: yadi tuṣṭo 'si me deva yadi deyo varo mama /
GP12vampsm_u:2444: tasyaitad vacanaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭaḥ provāca śaṅkaraḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2445: eṣo 'pi pāpinirmukto bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_27.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:2447: tathā stavamimaṃ śrutvā mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ // VamPSm_27.22 //
GP12vampsm_u:2449: mama liṅgasya cotpattiṃ śrutvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // VamPSm_27.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:2452: sa ca śvā tatkṣaṇādeva smṛtvā janma purātanam /
GP12vampsm_u:2455: sthāṇatīrthe kuṭīṃ śūnyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokasamanvitaḥ // VamPSm_27.26 //
GP12vampsm_u:2457: satputreṇa tvayā vatsa trāto 'haṃ narakārmavāt // VamPSm_27.27 //
GP12vampsm_u:2459: asya sādhoḥ prasādena sthāṇordevasya darśanāt // VamPSm_27.28 //
GP12vampsm_u:2460: muktāpāpaśca svarlokaṃ yāsye yatra śivaḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2462: sthāṇutīrthe yayau siddhiṃ tena putreṇa tāritaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2463: sa ca śvā paramāṃ siddhiṃ sthāṇutīrthaprabhāvataḥ // VamPSm_27.30 //
GP12vampsm_u:2468: suhṛdo 'tha ṛṇairmuktvā kāmaiḥ saṃtarpya ca striyaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2469: abhiṣicya sutaṃ rājye kurukṣetraṃ yayau nṛpaḥ // VamPSm_27.33 //
GP12vampsm_u:2470: tatra taptvā tapo ghoraṃ pūjayitvā ca śaṅkaram /
GP12vampsm_u:2471: ātmecchayā tanuṃ tyaktvā prayātaḥ paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_27.34 //
